com.google.android.exoplayer.extractor

Class ExtractorSampleSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.extractor.ExtractorSampleSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtractorOutput, SampleSource, Loader.Callback

    public class ExtractorSampleSource
extends Object
implements SampleSource, ExtractorOutput, Loader.Callback
    A SampleSource that extracts sample data using an Extractor

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExtractorSampleSource

        public ExtractorSampleSource(Uri uri,
                     DataSource dataSource,
                     Extractor extractor,
                     int downstreamRendererCount,
                     int requestedBufferSize)
        Parameters:
        uri - The Uri of the media stream.
        dataSource - A data source to read the media stream.
        extractor - An Extractor to extract the media stream.
        downstreamRendererCount - Number of track renderers dependent on this sample source.
        requestedBufferSize - The requested total buffer size for storing sample data, in bytes. The actual allocated size may exceed the value passed in if the implementation requires it.

      • ExtractorSampleSource

        public ExtractorSampleSource(Uri uri,
                     DataSource dataSource,
                     Extractor extractor,
                     int downstreamRendererCount,
                     int requestedBufferSize,
                     int minLoadableRetryCount)
        Parameters:
        uri - The Uri of the media stream.
        dataSource - A data source to read the media stream.
        extractor - An Extractor to extract the media stream.
        downstreamRendererCount - Number of track renderers dependent on this sample source.
        requestedBufferSize - The requested total buffer size for storing sample data, in bytes. The actual allocated size may exceed the value passed in if the implementation requires it.
        minLoadableRetryCount - The minimum number of times that the sample source will retry if a loading error occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public boolean prepare(long positionUs)
                throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: SampleSource
        Prepares the source.

        Preparation may require reading from the data source (e.g. to determine the available tracks and formats). If insufficient data is available then the call will return false rather than block. The method can be called repeatedly until the return value indicates success.

        Specified by:
        prepare in interface SampleSource
        Parameters:
        positionUs - The player's current playback position.
        Returns:
        True if the source was prepared successfully, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurred preparing the source.

      • enable

        public void enable(int track,
          long positionUs)
        Description copied from interface: SampleSource
        Enable the specified track. This allows the track's format and samples to be read from SampleSource.readData(int, long, MediaFormatHolder, SampleHolder, boolean).

        This method should not be called until after the source has been successfully prepared.

        Specified by:
        enable in interface SampleSource
        Parameters:
        track - The track to enable.
        positionUs - The player's current playback position.

      • continueBuffering

        public boolean continueBuffering(long playbackPositionUs)
                          throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: SampleSource
        Indicates to the source that it should still be buffering data.
        Specified by:
        continueBuffering in interface SampleSource
        Parameters:
        playbackPositionUs - The current playback position.
        Returns:
        True if the source has available samples, or if the end of the stream has been reached. False if more data needs to be buffered for samples to become available.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurred reading from the source.

      • readData

        public int readData(int track,
           long playbackPositionUs,
           MediaFormatHolder formatHolder,
           SampleHolder sampleHolder,
           boolean onlyReadDiscontinuity)
             throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: SampleSource
        Attempts to read either a sample, a new format or or a discontinuity from the source.

        This method should not be called until after the source has been successfully prepared.

        Note that where multiple tracks are enabled, SampleSource.NOTHING_READ may be returned if the next piece of data to be read from the SampleSource corresponds to a different track than the one for which data was requested.

        Specified by:
        readData in interface SampleSource
        Parameters:
        track - The track from which to read.
        playbackPositionUs - The current playback position.
        formatHolder - A MediaFormatHolder object to populate in the case of a new format.
        sampleHolder - A SampleHolder object to populate in the case of a new sample. If the caller requires the sample data then it must ensure that SampleHolder.data references a valid output buffer.
        onlyReadDiscontinuity - Whether to only read a discontinuity. If true, only SampleSource.DISCONTINUITY_READ or SampleSource.NOTHING_READ can be returned.
        Returns:
        The result, which can be SampleSource.SAMPLE_READ, SampleSource.FORMAT_READ, SampleSource.DISCONTINUITY_READ, SampleSource.NOTHING_READ or SampleSource.END_OF_STREAM.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurred reading from the source.

      • seekToUs

        public void seekToUs(long positionUs)
        Description copied from interface: SampleSource
        Seeks to the specified time in microseconds.

        This method should not be called until after the source has been successfully prepared.

        Specified by:
        seekToUs in interface SampleSource
        Parameters:
        positionUs - The seek position in microseconds.

      • getBufferedPositionUs

        public long getBufferedPositionUs()
        Description copied from interface: SampleSource
        Returns an estimate of the position up to which data is buffered.

        This method should not be called until after the source has been successfully prepared.

        Specified by:
        getBufferedPositionUs in interface SampleSource
        Returns:
        An estimate of the absolute position in microseconds up to which data is buffered, or TrackRenderer.END_OF_TRACK_US if data is buffered to the end of the stream, or TrackRenderer.UNKNOWN_TIME_US if no estimate is available.

        public TrackOutput track(int id)
        Description copied from interface: ExtractorOutput
        Invoked when the Extractor identifies the existence of a track in the stream.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
